ovdesc.p: This table is used within the Stock Dividends Module to identify and describe the various types of Stock dividend transactions.

desc.p: This field may be expanded to allow the user to enter the Description of the Stock.Div.Type in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new language as defined in the Language table and will indicate to the user the Language in which the Description is to be entered.
3 to 35 type AA (alphanumeric, first character must be alpha) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input).
Unique reference which identifies the Stock Dividend Type (Stock.Div.Type).
This record is not validated at any stage -it is purely for the convenience and accessibility of the 'user'.
1-5 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric) characters. (Mandatory input.)
Describes in abbreviated form the Stock.Div.Type.

This field may be expanded to allow the user to enter the Description of the Stock.Div.Type in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new language as defined in the Language table and will indicate to the user the Language in which the Description is to be entered.
3 to 15 type SS (uppercase alpha or numeric, first character must be alpha) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input).
